title: coinshop24
author: coinshop24
content: Coinshop24.org - deposit / withdrawal of BTC, LTC, ETH, USDT, EOS, NEO, ADA, ETC, ZEC, DASH, XLM, XMR, XRP, Binance Coin, TRX, DOGE, QIWI, Russian and CIS banks and many other coins . For our users, we offer a profitable referral program that will allow you not only to make exchanges with us, but also to earn on them!Read more in the section "Earn with us" For your convenience, we work around the clock and seven days a week. We are always open to communication and are ready to provide all options for cooperation. Our contacts:Email - help@coinshop24.orgTelegram - https://t.me/coinshop24 All exchanges are carried out exclusively through the creation of applications on our website Coinshop24.org

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: For your convenience, we work around the clock and seven days a week.

comments.author: Stakefast
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk  Any reviews on a recent customer somewhere? I can't find any, maybe you can show us some.Hard to trust a very new website, thats why I am asking.

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on September 11, 2022, 04:33:13 PMWelcome to Bitcointalk  Any reviews on a recent customer somewhere? I can't find any, maybe you can show us some.Hard to trust a very new website, thats why I am asking.Hello! We have been successfully working in the cryptocurrency market for almost 4 years. On the page of our site, in the "reviews" section, you can see a list of forums and monitorings on which we are posted. Here is some of them: https://www.bestchange.ru/coinshop24-exchanger.html                                 https://www.bestchange.com/coinshop24-exchanger.html                                 https://kurs.expert/ru/obmennik/coinshop24-net/feedbacks.htmlWe will be glad to answer your questions! We work around the clock and seven days a week!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!We are glad to inform you that we have started a successful cooperation with the monitoring of exchange offices exchangesumo.comLink to our profile where you can leave positive feedback about our work - https://exchangesumo.com/exchanger/1003/coinshop24/

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Today is the last day of November for our clients, we have made the best courses. Come in and make a profitable exchange! We are waiting for you and have a nice day!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: There is one more currency on our website. Added new direction Toncoin. Now you can buy or sell TON. We are waiting for you for new exchanges!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear and dear our customers!On the eve of the upcoming new year, I would like to express my deep gratitude to you for showing a trusting attitude towards us and wish you great success in the new year.Let our service become a launching pad for new ups, achievements, discoveries, victories!We wish you to meet it with optimism, to spend it productively, to achieve high results!  We give all our customers a promo code for a discount. More details can be found in the chat on our website. We are waiting for you and Happy New Year!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!We hasten to inform you that by the end of the month the best rates on the market for buying and selling cryptocurrencies have been set. We are waiting for you for new exchanges!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear our users!We are running a cash draw. It is necessary to make an exchange on our website from March 21-31. At the end of the month, we will select 5 users who will receive 5,000 rubles each. The more exchanges, the greater the chance of getting a prize.The best exchange rates on the market are also displayed for your profitable exchange. Waiting for you!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!New destinations have been added to our website. Sending to UZCARD, HUMO and Visa/MasterCard AZN cards is possible. We are waiting for you for new exchanges!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!There are more payment methods for acquiring crypto assets.New currencies for acceptance have been added to our website: EUR, AZN, UZS, TRY, GBP, INR.We are waiting for you for new exchanges!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!We have good news for you. Now making exchanges has become much more convenient. Our service has released the "CoinShop24" application on Google Play. Now you don’t need to waste time constantly searching for a service. Go to our website, download the application and exchange in a couple of minutes!We are waiting for you on the website and in the "CoinShop24" application for new exchanges!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!    On New Year's Eve, we would like to express our deep gratitude to you for showing your trust in us!    We wish you success in the New Year, financial stability, family well-being and confidence in the future.    So that all your ideas are realized without hindrance and good luck accompanies you every minute.    During the New Year period, we have prepared individual terms of cooperation and exchange discounts for you. Contact the chat for details. We are waiting for you on our website for new exchanges! All the best to you and all the best in the New Year!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!We have our own telegram channel. Follow the news in the world of cryptocurrencies, as well as special promotions on our website. Go to our website, subscribe to the news channel.We are waiting for you for new exchanges on our website!

comments.author: coinshop24
comments.body: Dear users!Our website design has changed. Now creating applications has become much easier and more convenient. We invite you for new exchanges!

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: coinshop24 on August 27, 2024, 11:36:55 AMOur website design has changed.I have no idea about your platform's previous state, but it appears that the numbers that are being shown in the exchange window as your reserve, aren't reflecting on the reserve page: Screenshot [which one is the accurate one?]- BTW, nothing appears on the FAQ page when I'm switching the language to English.Quote from: https://coinshop24.org/aml/To determine such transactions, the service Coinshop24.org uses the service web.amlbot.com .Are you solely relying on their AML software?- I had false-positive results with it in the past (occasionally) and lately, they seem to be abusing their power against a certain exchange!Quote from: https://coinshop24.org/aml/When making a refund, after passing the verification, the user is obliged to confirm the details for receiving a refund. The refund fee is deducted from the client's funds.How much are you charging to refund your users' money?Quote from: https://coinshop24.org/aml/If the user does not provide the requested information and does not respond to the service's requests within 3 calendar months, the funds withheld will not be refunded.And what are you going to do with those seized assets?

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: coinshop24 on August 27, 2024, 11:36:55 AMDear users!Our website design has changed. Now creating applications has become much easier and more convenient. We invite you for new exchanges!I do not think too many people know what your service was like in the past, i see that your op was made since 2022, but as far as i know it didn't gain much traction in the forum as you have been the only person writing in this topic. I recommend that you edit your op with information on how your service works now, for better understanding. When i enter your website, i see that it is not displayed in English language, how do i switch it to English Language.
